it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.ethernet

Class EthPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net.DataPacket
      • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.ethernet.EthPacket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Packet, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class EthPacket
extends DataPacket
    An Ethernet packet (IEEE 802.3).

        dst_addr - destination address

      • EthPacket

        public EthPacket(Address src_addr,
                 Address dst_addr,
                 int type,
                 byte[] data_buf,
                 int data_off,
                 int data_len)
        Creates a new packet.
        Parameters:
        src_addr - source address
        dst_addr - destination address
        type - the Ethernet (payload) type
        data_buf - the buffer containing the payload data
        data_off - the offset within the buffer
        data_len - the payload length
